column2:
standing pose																															
	in 	left arm up																														
	out	bend to right side																														
	in 	arm up straight																														
	out 	arm back										5 kleshas - ego, attachment, abhinivesha-survival, craving, resentment																				
	in 	right arm up																														
	out	bend to left side																														
	in 	arm up straight																														
	out 	arm back											u dont want to be a gold fish looking out all the time
living together makes rough stones smooth
unaware - everything is someone else's fault-> 50-50-my fault
smile(mudita mudra), stickability, will power, flexibility, -make things happen
